titles.title: Federal Mandate Funding Act of 1993
A bill to provide Federal assistance to States and local governments required to comply with direct cost Federal mandates.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14766-14767)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 11/1/1993--Introduced. Federal Mandate Funding Act of 1993 - Makes inapplicable to a State or local government for a two-year period any duty or requirement imposed by Federal statute or regulation that creates a Federal mandate which is not funded in part by the Federal Government. Establishes in the Treasury the Federal Mandate Assistance Fund to provide financial assistance to qualified State and local governments for complying with Federal mandates. Authorizes appropriations.
